title: Story Chaser is the Quickest and Most Engaging Speed Reading Storybook Game
text:
Story Chaser was featured on NewsWatch as part of its monthly AppWatch , which takes a look at the latest and coolest applications on the market for iOS, Android, and Windows. Scott Steinberg, special reporter for NewsWatch and mobile technology expert, conducted the app review and shared with viewers how this app is the quickest and most engaging speed reading game.
(PRWEB) October 10, 2015
Story Chaser is a one-of-a-kind app that makes reading fun while helping children learn to read. It works by reading various classics and inspiring stories and as words drop down and users tap the corresponding word. By answering correctly player earn Chaser Coins.
The animations are extremely aesthetic and can be interacted with, making it a more engaging game. Users can use what are called Reading Powers to gain extra time in the game, highlight words, shuffle questions and even unlock hidden animations. There are over 30 levels broken down as different parts of a whole story, and as players advance they unlock new levels and stories.
Players can progress from Good Reader all the way to Fantastic Reader for bragging rights and to monitor performance. This is a unique new way to learn to read fast while retaining the meaning of what is just read. Story Chaser is available on iOS and Android devices for free.
To learn more, visit http://www.story-chaser.com today.
